segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, her arm outstretched, looking at her brother like he’s about to perform the greatest magic trick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amusing, really, watching their little secret unfold in front of the oblivious woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But a part of me feels uneasy, imagining the chaos that could ensue if he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see that cookie jar full of treats, tempting them like an inviting treasure chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy stretches upward gives him this look of determination; it’s almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet I can’t shake off the feeling of disgust at how sneaky they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the woman finds out? I wonder how she’d react to their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
